alert.note: Alert for North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Walton County through 345 PM CDT... At 312 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Eglin Air Force Base to near De Funiak Springs. Movement was north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Fox Hill, Pleasant Ridge, Alpine Heights, De Funiak Spring Airport and Mossy Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
